The post mentioned that Delhi NCR: which includes the capital city of New Delhi, will be placed under a four-week lockdown starting from June 18, 2020.
The claim circulated just days after Del: week lockdown due to the COVID-19 pandemic.
The Indian government: s official Press Information Bureau (PIB) issued a tweet on June 14, 2020, calling the claim "fake" and stating that there is no such plan under consideration.
